_sText:
**************

AIM CHURCHES X

**************

By Jeremy "Air" Hurley



So in the rar are 2 folders. One is called "WITH BUYZONE" and one is called "WITH RIFLES".


**** IMPORTANT ****

In the "WITH BUYZONE" folder is the map AIM_CHURCHES_X_BZ
This version of the map has NO WEAPONS (except HE's) on the map. ONLY a buyzone for each team.

In the "WITH RIFLES" folder is the map AIM_CHURCHES_X_WP
This version of the map has RIFLES all over - M4A1 for CT and AK47 for T.



**** NOTES ****

I know this map still isn't perfect. It could use displacements and a 3d skybox. I know. And I still don't care to add those.

If you want me to make any of my other GUNGAME MAPS into an FY or AIM map, please PM me and tell me. If no one does, then I won't convert those. It only takes about 30 minutes to convert, though. So let me know.

Thanks,
Jeremy "Air" Hurley
